009package imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay;
010
011import java.util.List;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.guibas.Triangle2D;
015
016/**
017 * Interface specification for various implementations of the
018 * Delaunay triangulation.
019 */
020public interface DelaunayTriangulation {
021        
022        /**
023         * Returns the number of triangles in this triangulation.
024         * @return the number of triangles
025         */
026        public int size();
027        
028        /**
029         * Returns a list of {@link Triangle2D} instances
030         * contained in this triangulation. The list does not contain the initial outer 
031         * triangle.
032         * @return a list of triangles 
033         */
034        public List<Triangle> getTriangles();
035        
036        /**
037         * Returns a list of 2D vertices (implementing the {@link Pnt2d} interface)
038         * contained in this triangulation. The sequence of points is assumed
039         * to be in the order of their actual insertion. The list does not contain the
040         * vertices of the initial (outer) triangle.
041         * @return a list of points
042         */
043        public List<Pnt2d> getPoints();
044
045}
